extendedInfo.description: Over 750,000 Current & Past Sex Offenders ALL 50 STATESThe One-of-a-Kind App That Can Truly Make You Safer ...  We Have Both Current Sex Offenders And Past Sex Offenders (That No Longer Have To Register In The Official Registry). ONCE PUBLIC RECORD ALWAYS PUBLIC RECORD.Currently over 750,000 registered sex offenders in the U.S.  As years go by, these criminals are set free to live as our neighbors mostly going unnoticed.  Some Sex  Offenders often commit crimes again and again and can threaten the safety of our communities.  Most online listings are incomplete and only contain current offenders.  You need to know who may put you and your family in danger. YOU HAVE THE RIGHT TO KNOW YOUR NEIGHBORS PASTOur latest release, SEX OFFENDER ARCHIVES puts the power of knowing -- In your hands.  The SEX OFFENDER ARCHIVE app, is the only sex crime archive application in the world that actually archives sex offender records.We have taken the same advanced technology and attention to detail that we have implemented in our websites, to bring you the most comprehensive listing of current and past offenders.  This listing can be a useful tool in knowing if the people living in your area (or wherever you choose) have a history of sexual offenses..

reviews.title: Impressive
reviews.comment: Out of all that I\'ve tried this one had the most & \"Fairly\" up to date. It\'s pretty easy to use but there is no back button per say as it brings you back to the beginning which is frustrating. Lived up to it\'s name I\'d say as it even had a person who has been dead for about 5 Yrs lol.
reviews.author: Steve Fluke

reviews.comment: I\'m surprised that the are peoples pictures up for all to see when the crime is or was indecent exposure. America is a truly wierd country.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Messed up
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t show all of the sex offenders.
reviews.author: Elizabeth Bohl

reviews.title: Not the best
reviews.comment: Like I just said on another reading tried other apps for this specific thing and I did not find this app very useful and it did not put my mind at ease this app was a little more difficult to use and did not seem up to date on another app I found twice as many predators trackable.
reviews.author: Naomi Sugar

reviews.title: Inaccurate
reviews.comment: Only shows about 2% of actual sex offenders...
reviews.author: Steven F

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: The best thing ever happen to keep kids safe
reviews.author: Theresa Donaway
